mapper.select: SELECT reservation_id as id, room_id as room, user_id as user, total_price as totalPrice, total_guest as totalGuest, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, status, is_review_created as isReviewCreated, createdAt, updatedAt, reservation_code as reservationCode FROM Reservation WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId} AND user_id = #{userId}
